mapper.select: select dept_no as no, dept_name as name from sample_departments order by dept_no asc
select position_no as no, position_name as name from sample_positions order by position_no

select id as "id", encrypt_password as "encryptPassword", name as "name", email as "email", auth as "auth", dept_no as deptNo, position_no as positionNo, created_date as "createdDate", updated_date as "updatedDate" from sample_employees where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sample_employees (id, encrypt_password, name, email, auth, dept_no, position_no, created_date, updated_date) values (#{id}, #{encryptPassword}, #{name}, #{email}, #{auth}, #{deptNo}, #{positionNo}, now(), now())
